ing: 2 fluid ounces Irish cream liqueur (such as BaileysÂ®)
des: "My husband came up with this recipe. I love coffee and hot chocolate. Now when I have had a bad day, I tell him it is a 'Comfort in a Cup' day."
ins: Whisk hot coffee, milk, Irish cream liqueur, hot chocolate mix, and vodka together in a mug until hot chocolate mix has dissolved.
